website_summaries.verdict: A great option for a more affordable keto bar that still tastes good.
pros: Many compare the taste of this bar to a Crunch bar
Each contains 90 calories, 1 gram of sugar, 8 grams of protein, and 2 net carbs
cons: The bars are a bit small in size and the lower calorie count means they may not keep you full as long as some other bars

customer_reviews.title: FALSE NUTRITION FACTS
customer_reviews.text: Product tastes great but I do not believe the nutritional breakdown is correct and I therefore question the QUALITY and the INGREDIENTS and question everything this bar claims to be. This Bar claims to have 90 CALORIES, 8 GRAMS of PROTEIN, 4 GRAMS of FAT and 15 GRAMS of CARBS...... 8g PROTEIN = 32 calories 15g CARBS = 60 calories 4g FAT = 36 calories for a TOTAL of 128 CALORIES assuming the MACRO grams were rounded up... the MATH still does not make sense....as 7g of protein, 14g of carbs and 3 grams of fat would TOTAL 111 CALORIES; I find this unacceptable and would like an explanation!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed... bad box.
customer_reviews.text: DISSAPPOINTED!!! These bars are so good but the lastest box I got they look old and messed up. Photo attach shows two from the latest box and one form another box. Sadly I cannot return the defective box.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Maines

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting protein bars
customer_reviews.text: Update: I found a customer service email and they were very helpful. Bernhard@neoh.com The bars are pricey but really good. I ordered a second box and I had an issue. My first box was great, the first bar from my second box was discolored, smashed on one end and dried out. Tried to return on Amazon but this item is non returnable. Tried to contact the company but they have no customer service number. Disappointed with the high cost that I have no way of getting a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price (maybe half the price)!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to these bars. Upon arrival, I was extremely disappointed. They are SUPER TINY. I've included photos. Think somewhere between a Halloween candy size and a single serving retail candy bar. When I opened by bar, it looked sad. Some whitening throughout each bar I've had and some minor melting from shipping. It was plain ugly to look at. Flavor is lacking. Maybe due to a bad batch, but the flavor is your standard protein bar with a slightly more "powdery/chalky" aftertaste. Wasn't a good experience at all. I'd recommend shopping elsewhere for the dollar amount. Just not worth this price point ($22).
customer_reviews.author: Vyktamus

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: These bars were absolutely delicious. The taste was very pure and simple, a combination of a smooth/creamy chocolate on the outside with some crunch in the middle. I like that the sweetener is xylitol. The calorie and nutrition profile makes for a healthy snack option. We have three kids and they all loved them as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hits the sweet spot!!
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting bars, low sugar and only 3 WW smartpoints! They definitely hit the sweet spot!
customer_reviews.author: actcan

customer_reviews.title: Not keto at all!
customer_reviews.text: Actual net carbs are closer 10g per bar if you count each alcohol sugar as half its content as carbs (witch they are) minus the fiber = around 10 to be safe on keto carbs. Falsely advertised as keto friendly. Eat one of these and thats have your carbs for the day. Not every person processes sugar alcohol the same but these cant be trusted for keto.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Ugh.
customer_reviews.text: Yuck. Save your money. Try this simple trick instead: Cut cardboard into candy bar sized strips, dip into melted chocolate, scrape the chocolate off, and serve at room temperature. Net carbs per cardboard strip is 0.5-1 gram per serving. I read that they are toxic to dogs, so my options for disposal are limited. I'm hoping to find out if these are toxic to freshwater fish, as I know of a river that I could dump them into. NASTY NASTY I wish I could leave a NEGATIVE star 🌟
customer_reviews.author: HiTekRedNek

customer_reviews.title: The low calories per each is ideal for helping with weight loss
customer_reviews.text: This is a great snack and the taste is good! For 90 calories and 15 grams of carbs each it great for a diabetic watching their carb intake! Good chocolate flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The worst tasting power bar I have ever had, by far.
customer_reviews.text: Unless you like the Taste of dirt do not waste your money on this product. I bought them to try and mix up my protein bar taste. I was barely able to get one of these bars down. I kept thinking that it would get better has I got closer to finishing it. It did't, it got even worse. A lot of these bars have little or no taste but this a terrible tasting bar from the first bite. I had to give it at least one star rating. If they had the option for a negative star rating that is what I would have given it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this protein bar!!
customer_reviews.text: This is 3 WWSP and I feel like I am eating a candy bar! Keeping one of these in my purse gets me through and stops binge eating. LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Gloss

customer_reviews.title: KETO FRIENDLY!
customer_reviews.text: I LIVE for these protein bars! I wish they weren't so expensive but I'll pay whatever they cost...SO GOOD and Keto Friendly!
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the BEST
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. After being a loyal patriot, I had to try these. I have eaten about 100 of these and will never buy another brand!
customer_reviews.author: J.Sullivan.J

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, only 1g of sugar. Way better than having your typical candy bar
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't expecting it to taste this good, but Neoh exceeded all of my expectations. I love having one of these in the morning with my tea, as a snack at work, and ill eat one after a gym workout. I find myself eating 3-4 of these and then I realize i've only just had 3-4 grams of sugar. It is nice to finally have something that I wont feel guilty eating and that satisifies my midnight cravings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: I have Type II Diabetes and on occasion I crave chocolate. I have been searching for an alternative that tastes great and is satisfying. I heard about this product on social media and decided to give it a try. I must say I was a little skeptical because i have tried other bars and found they have an after taste, and a list of ingredients that I have never heard of before. My order arrived and and I tried the bar. I must say the taste was great and it satisfied the craving for something sweet without having a lot of sugar. I will purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: David Bedard

customer_reviews.title: They DO have 2g net carbs, read further.
customer_reviews.text: To the other reviews stating that these have more than 2g net carbs, I recommend you do your research instead of leaving an uninformed review... erythritol, xylitol, and maltitol are all sugar alcohols, which most sugar alcohols don't count as net carbs because they aren't digested. Now on to my review, these things have been a life saver, they're delicious and while sitting at only 90 calories, they are very filling! They're comparable to those kudos bars!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Vidrine

customer_reviews.title: Sweetened with Maltitol.  Will spike your blood sugar!
customer_reviews.text: I tried these out and they taste great! I didn’t realize they were sweetened with Maltitol until after I ate a couple & started having the wonderful laxitave side effect that comes with Maltitol. Maltitol also has a Glycemic Index of about 36 where sucrose (sugar) has a glycemic index of 65. Long story short, it spikes your blood sugar. You might as well eat half a Snickers bar. If they removed the Maltitol and used a better sugar alcohol with a low Glycemic Index I’d have rated this bar a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great On-The-Go Snack
customer_reviews.text: I've been really enjoying these bars for about 8 months. I always throw a few in my backpack when I go camping. Kills my sweats cravings. \m/
customer_reviews.author: C. Joy

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: These bars are amazing. And only 90 calories! I’ve lost 85 pounds so far and suffered through it with little to no sweets. If only this was around earlier it would’ve made things 10x easier. Tbh I’m pretty skeptical about the nutritional facts no way they’re this low calorie.
customer_reviews.author: Rami

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cravings
customer_reviews.text: I don't review many things. But I felt this ones worth reviewing. If you're on the keto diet, this is a great way to satisfy chocolate cravings. It's not going to taste as good as a "pure" candy bar, but it's the best thing I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas stevens

customer_reviews.title: These are DELICIOUS!!!
customer_reviews.text: like crazy extra yummy and only half a bar satisfies any sweet craving i have around my cycle. i will always have these around and my children are NOT allowed to touch! mine only :)
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth D

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Most delicious protein snack out there!
customer_reviews.text: Ate them all and nothing taste as good as these! Feel guilty eating them as they taste like you’re indulging on a candy bar! No weird aftertaste, or jawbreaking texture at all. These are so delicious and on my second box already! With only 90 calories, super amazing in a pinch for a protein snack or pre/post workout boost.
customer_reviews.author: LoveThatDirtyWater

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great and gives a solid protein boost
customer_reviews.text: Found this at a post-race exhibit in Bellevue, WA. The owner was giving out samples and I thought they tasted pretty good so decided to order a box. I really like them. They are super low in sugar, have a solid amount of protein, taste very good, and I like the size (90 calories per bar). It's hard to find protein bars that aren't in excess of 200 calories. These bars are only 90, so they're handy for a quick snack to hold me over for an hour until lunch or dinner. I'll definitely be buying more of these!
customer_reviews.author: R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Neoh tastes great! Excellent choice in place of sugar infested options. Little pricey, but I'll definitely be getting more.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: 15G of Carbs
customer_reviews.text: They are small-and just another protein bar with 15grams of Carbs so nit necessarily a keto option.
customer_reviews.author: Redbonecowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bar for when you have a sweet tooth but don’t want the guilt of real junk!
customer_reviews.author: J-M Sully

customer_reviews.title: Give me my chocolate!
customer_reviews.text: Holy smokes, best "candy bar" ever. I wish I could have a lifetime supply. They're to die for!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get me wrong, the bars taste good. However, they advertise the bar as being 2g net carbs but how? The nutrition label states 15g carbs, 2g fiber, 1g sugar. To me, that equals 13g net carbs which is false advertising. If I would have known that, I wouldn’t have purchased the product. I would have ordered my go to Quest bars which are bigger and way less carbs than this bar. I am highly dissatisfied with the advertising of this product. But I will admit they do taste good if you are not worried about eating carbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A protein bar that actually tastes good.
customer_reviews.text: A delicious snack that's low on sugar. 1g of sugar. 90 calories 8g of protein. And it actually tastes good. I've tried lots of protein bars, that usually taste like flavored cardboard. This one tastes like a semi-sweet Crunch bar.
customer_reviews.author: CappTechTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting product at a even greater price!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son is on a ketogenic diet and absolutely loved this product!!! We will be return customers!!!
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Definitely "good for you"
customer_reviews.text: This bar is definitely the best tasting protein bar I've ever had, but that being said, its flavor still told me plainly that this bar was "good for me". It gave me an energy boost, and killed the snack craving. It is super crunchy, like chocolate dipped granola mixed with a Nestle Crunch bar, but has a gritty texture that is hard to ignore. It left my mouth dry and with a strange after taste. So, again the best tasting protein bar I've ever had, but doesn't "taste like a candy bar".
customer_reviews.author: J Bart Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Good taste and texture
customer_reviews.text: These protein bars taste good and aren't like eating sand! I like the very low sugar content. That was a key reason for trying them. My kids are also enjoying them as a morning starter or exercise snack. I primarily eat them during long bicycle rides which are between 50 and 100 miles. Exactly when I want energy but not having to force down a gritty protein bar.
customer_reviews.author: Spinmaster

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Ok I’m going to break this down into a few different points: Ketoness: I bought these because it said they were keto and I was looking for a change from my usual Quest bar. Based on my math they’re 3 net carbs. Texture: Ok, the first bite was really crisp and clean but then it turns into a gritty mess. Taste: Definitly not a Snickers bar like the ad said on Facebook. It had a weird underlying taste and was way too artificial. Final verdict: They’re really small bars and I don’t think they’re worth the money. I’ll try another one from the box later this week and if it’s any better the 2nd time I’ll update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Quintana

customer_reviews.title: Crunch Bar Taste with Macronutrients in Mind!
customer_reviews.text: NEOH CrossBars are a fantastic and delicious way to help reach your cutting/macronutrient goals! I loved using the CrossBars to curb my sweet tooth while also helping me hit my macros for the day! The taste reminds me of a crunch bar but waaaaay healthier! I save room for this bar every day in my macros which is super easy to do because each bar only containing 90 calories, 15 grams of carbs, 8 grams of protein, and 4 grams of fat! I highly recommend this bar for people who aren’t only counting macros and looking to lose weight but who also want a healthier alternative to a candy bar!
customer_reviews.author: McKensie Herold

customer_reviews.title: Never wrote a review before but...
customer_reviews.text: Have to do my duty to save some people. It has the consistency of dirt and tastes like I dumped a hot chocolate packet directly into my mouth with a terrible after taste. If you can handle the taste I'm sure it's better for you than an actual candy bar but other than the nutritional side there's no point in even bothering.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Absolutly loving these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bars! Taste really like candy and give a pretty good boost of energy as a post workout snack. I started my keto diet two months ago and was looking for some Keto friendly bars, so far I'm loving it and can say that I would def recommend it! It's been two weeks and I haven't gotten through the entire box yet cause these protein bars are pretty fulfilling. Will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as most Atkins bars.
customer_reviews.text: Not like a crunch bar. Edible but not pleasant...dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: definitely going to restock
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best low-carb snacks I've ever had!!!! And it's also low calorie so that's a bonus. It tastes like a candy bar and the creamy chocolate outer layer is heavenly. My non-keto family approved as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mariam Sabra

customer_reviews.title: Low Sugar KETO Snack
customer_reviews.text: NEOH is a low carb protein and candy bar. I tried it and I like it very much, but it is an expensive treat. I will buy again as I love chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: SOLO RVER

customer_reviews.title: So good and low carb!
customer_reviews.text: Oh these actually taste good! Finally something that taste like the real thing!
customer_reviews.author: Pocamo50

customer_reviews.title: Best Tasting Protein Bar
customer_reviews.text: No other bar that I've tried compares to Neoh in taste. It tastes very similar to a KitKat, which is an accomplishment given it only has 1 gram of sugar + 8 grams of protein. I'll definitely be buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Alec Mountain

customer_reviews.title: Favorite bar!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on a whim because I saw an ad on Facebook and I was pleasantly surprised. They taste great (just like one of those Nestle Crunch bars, but like a version with better ingredients that doesn't feel like a cheap candy bar), are super low calorie, and only 1g of sugar! It's become my new favorite bar!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth D. Matson

customer_reviews.title: Delicious chocolate (candy) snack bar!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe these have protein! Tastes like you're cheating on your diet, but you're not. Truly an indulgent candy bar with nothing bad. It kicks that chocolate craving right out! They are only 90 calories, too!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Been eating these for a quick hunger fix at work. They taste great and you feel you have eaten something (not just a sugar candy bar). Wish they were a little cheaper but will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Zed

customer_reviews.title: All my kids loved it. The taste lives up to their brand ...
customer_reviews.text: All my kids loved it. The taste lives up to their brand statement. Tastes like a true chocolate candy bar. Love the 1g of sugar!
customer_reviews.author: Claus

customer_reviews.title: Good for a quick snack
customer_reviews.text: My biggest problem with 90% of all protein bars is that they are super high in fats and calories. Im a fan of a quick protein snack while I work where I don't feel bloated and over-carbed. Overall its low-cal, virtually no sugar and tastes pretty good considering its selling as a protein bar. Totally will purchase again once I run out at its current price point.
customer_reviews.author: Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Great taste.
customer_reviews.text: Great taste. They live up to their brand they are promoting. Either wait until they start shipping in refrigerated trucks though or order them in the winter. These things melted fast. It was about 70 degrees where I live in Iowa. When I got them they were half melted. Most likely from the truck they were on.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ward

customer_reviews.title: Fill that hunger void! Don't be a diva, and don't eat an unhealthy Snicker's....Eat a NEOH bar!
customer_reviews.text: These are DELICIOUS!!!! I have tried many, many protein bars in my lifetime. From A-Z. These are absolutely amazing. The perfect go-to snack to fill that hunger need that may or may not have turned you into a diva. Don't be a diva... And don't eat a Snicker's. Grab a NEOH Bar and feel better about yourself for making the healthy decision :) And why are people commenting that they are deadly to dogs? Hello, knock knock... Don't feed it to your dogs or any animals for that matter, only humans. Problem solved. Next!
customer_reviews.author: Robot Stensen

customer_reviews.title: Taste good
customer_reviews.text: I find these to be the best tasting protein bars on the market. They don’t have a chemical after taste and they are not dry and bland. They legitimately taste like a thicker crackle bar. I’ve seen a few people talk about them arriving and not looking right. That’s because the melt. That’s not the manufacturers issue that is just what happens when they sit outside on your porch. Throw them in the refrigerator for an hour and they are fine. It doesn’t effect the taste. My one and only complaint is the price. It’s roughly 2 dollars a bar. That’s pretty steep for the size. I wouldn’t pay 2 dollars for a Twix or a snickers.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Quite good
customer_reviews.text: Being on the KETO diet it's hard to find something low in carbs, low in sugar and has flavor. NEOH has accomplished this. Trust me, I have read a hundreds of labels and nothing come close. One great thing it has going for it is it is filling. Gets you from one meal to another. NEOH is a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to the keto pantry to take care of ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh my, these are delicious. Excellent addition to the keto pantry to take care of any cravings you might have.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L Muray

customer_reviews.title: Taste good
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting bars. Would hold me over really well between meals and do t have a chalky diet food taste. Not as good as a snickers but I would choose them over a snickers because they are close enough and much better for you
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend against them. Bad taste.
customer_reviews.text: I've been making the switch to healthier snack foods for several years ( turkey pepperoni, bison been sticks, ECT) The problem is this not a good flavor profile. A fibrous, soy-filled snack with bad chocolate is not the same as the chocolate we love. I do not regret trying them, but it's better just eating less of the real thing than trying to indulge in this lie. Also I got a bit of a stomach ache twice when I had them for dessert. Just stick to dark chocolate, people.
customer_reviews.author: That's Mr Bullet!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Low Sugar Bar
customer_reviews.text: These are just plain good. I use them as a mid round golf snack. As a type 2 Diabetic, I am always looking for lower carb sweet hit, and these work. They are smaller, but very good.
customer_reviews.author: DJSjerve

customer_reviews.title: Great low carb candy bar.
customer_reviews.text: These taste great. Nice low carb snack when you want something sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Walbeck

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Healthy
customer_reviews.text: These taste too good to be healthy but they are healthy!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Tasty treat!  Just a little bit on the "too" sweet side.
customer_reviews.text: I really do enjoy these candy bars, and they are very tasty, indeed! With the macros on the being unbelievably good, he only thing that I don't particularly like about them is that the are EXTREMELY sweet, even for a sweet! I still have them on subscription, so obviously, they are quite edible, but if I could ask them to make a slight change to them, it would be to dull the sweetness about 20%.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the taste
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the taste , will be buying again , the only thing i would change would be the size of the bar , for that price point i would like a bigger sized bar and more flavors other then chocolate would be amazing , bought through The Loyal Patriot twitch stream with a discount.
customer_reviews.author: Robm1979

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I get hungry for snacks and need something to eat that isn't gonna be a calorie/fatty snack. The bar is kinda thin. Similar to a whatchamacallit bar. The taste is similar to dark chocolate. So not super sweet but enough. The texture is the worse part imo. It feels very sandy when you're chewing. It cost a lot too, but to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Scared v

customer_reviews.title: Keto Candy Bar
customer_reviews.text: Close your eyes, use your imagination, and poof! You are eating a candy bar! Perfect for those on keto, lazy keto, or just those who are careful with their weight. 90 calories and a decent amount of protein.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's edible but not very good
customer_reviews.text: Can't return. They dont taste like a candy bar that's for sure, most other protien bars taste better from quest to muscle farm. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite but they are decent.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasant chocolate taste but also a very small bar so as a “cravings buster” it won’t do the trick for me. There are other healthy chocolate bars out there that I prefer to these but only do to the volume of the bar, not necessarily the taste. With all that being said, I wouldn’t turn one down if it were handed to me as a snack, I just don’t think the value is there.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: These don't live up to the hype. If you've ever had gatorade's protein bars these are the same just a smaller size hence less calories. They're nothing like the candy bar the company compares it to in their adds and are not worth shelling out the cash and shipping for.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan K

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!  You will not be let down!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I found these!! They are amazing!! My entire family loves them!! Will continue to purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: The bars a pretty small (and thin) and taste OK (not great). While they have enough protein, they are not filling at all. Also, I had a box for a couple of weeks and the chocolate inside started turning white. They go bad quickly. I tried putting them in the refrigerator but they get too dry. I will not be buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: grizel c. ferro

customer_reviews.title: No way
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't buy again. Pretty sweet to me. Half a bar might be enough. Very rich taste to the point it almost sort of burns my throat. The longer I ate it the more it became too sweet. It should stave off the taste for something sweet for while. The taste is ok. I wouldn't order a box until you tried a bar first. The bars made my stomach hurt and gave me a belly ache. Not eating the rest of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Shocco

customer_reviews.title: Gave Me the Poops
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the reviews and because it was offered on sale for about $8 less than the regular price. It gave me the poops. Some sugars affect people different ways and this affected me. So, I will finish the box because they don't taste bad but I have to make sure I'm home the rest of the day. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SUCRALOSE INSIDE
customer_reviews.text: The formula for these bars has changed. They now contain SUCRALOSE. This will be my last purchase. I have been avoiding artificial sweeteners in all the foods I eat. This great bar has now become something I have to avoid because the manufacturer thinks it is really necessary to add SUCRALOSE.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Romano

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I ran across this product on a Facebook ad, and figured I'd give it a shot. The numbers looked better than the usual Kashi bars I eat, so I was a bit leery on how they would taste, and how big they were. They are about the same size as your traditional granola bar, and they taste delicious. The numbers work for me so I'll definitely be ordering more of these! Perfect for those sweet tooth cravings.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Great snack!
customer_reviews.text: Bar was tasty and I don't feel guilty as a diabetic having one now and then.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybugrwv

customer_reviews.title: 4-pack was stale
customer_reviews.text: I generally like these bars and have been ordering the single boxes for a while now. I decided to go ahead and order the pack of 4 boxes this time to really load up on them. The 4-pack must be them trying to offload expired or nearly expired bars because these ones were stale and hard to bite into. Definitely not up to par.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Yummy but not as keto friendly as I thought. I have to tke like one bite a day. One bar has to many carbs for a 30 and under carb limit
customer_reviews.author: Pretty Rikki Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Good Taste But dont like that it is ARTIFICIALLY Flavored!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Saw the product and wanted to give it a shot... never saw in the description that the product was artificially flavored . would have love to know prior to buying the product. as it would have changed my mind about buying it in the first place. Will not be buying this again as I didn't like the lack of disclosure regarding the flavoring in the amazon product details.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Great protein bars
customer_reviews.text: These are really good protein bars. Very pleasantly surprised, as I've tried a bunch. Low calorie, low sugar - will purchase again. I wish they could come out with a vanilla flavored bar with the same ingredients, calories, protein, low sugar, as I'm not a chocoholic. I have these mid-day, or nighttime snack, with the low calorie factor, but would rather have a vanilla flavor for me.
customer_reviews.author: LouAnn Falcon

customer_reviews.title: pretty tasty
customer_reviews.text: if you need a cheat and still keep it keto friendly its not a bad choice. not the best either but great flavor is why i gave it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great for some on a low carb or diabetic diet
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is good and excellent choice if you need a chocolate fix without all carbs. Much like everything else that is a healthier choice it is a bit pricy, but seems comparable to other protein snack or meal bars.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W Butler

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: These were pretty good, not always in the mood for sure a dessert bar though, wish they had one that was more toned down into like snack bar.... but i cant complain, no artificial taste to them compared to most
customer_reviews.author: TheGuy

customer_reviews.title: Low sugar way to satisfy a sweet tooth
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a low sugar, low carb treat that can satisfy a strong sweet tooth - these chocolate bars do all of those things - I will be sharing these with my friends and continuing to buy them
customer_reviews.author: akelly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent alternative to a chocolate candy bar
customer_reviews.text: At first the flavor was too sweet, but after eating these for a while I have become accustomed to then to the point that I will not go back to eating regular candy bars. They satisfy the craving for chocolate and for crunchy snacking. I now get them delivered once a month.
customer_reviews.author: Mario A. Cubas

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: they are good compare to others out there, no they do not taste like a candy bar like in their ads, you wont be disappointed, price wise they are about the same as anyone else, I do wish they were a little bigger, but if you need something on the go they are great, they are good for keto and anyone who are watching sugar, and calories are low, you just cant go wrong with these
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Ford

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and no guilt!
customer_reviews.text: I searched for years for a dessert that would satisfy my sweet tooth and be good for me and my weight (low sugar/high protein). Was thrilled to find these and love the taste. They’re crunchy like a nestle crunch and Hershey krackle bar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Mom

customer_reviews.title: Addicted!
customer_reviews.text: These are so good! Doing keto for 9 months now and these are an awesome snack or on the go option.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: My new go to protein/low carb bar
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product and am so glad I did. The taste is incredible - with 90 calories/low carb. I will definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Beth RLK

customer_reviews.title: Pure yum
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting snack bar. Satisfies my need for chocolate and crunchy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: These bars are very tasty & I like the texture. Gives me a healthier alternative when I want a chocolate treat. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: tirednurseoklahoma

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: This bar is exactly what I was looking for, great taste, crunchy texture and low sugar! I feel like I'm cheating when I eat one, it tastes like a candy bar, rich chocolate with crispy bits sooooo good! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: A great protein bar that tastes like a candy bar!!!?
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at the taste
customer_reviews.text: These taste really good. A hard feat to pull off with 1 carb.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Segal

customer_reviews.title: These are delicious
customer_reviews.text: May be the only thing (besides bad choices) that satisfies my sweet tooth!
customer_reviews.author: dlh

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied my chocolate craving
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much satisfied my chocolate craving. Not the best tasting but good enough.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting Low Carb Bar!
customer_reviews.text: These bars truly have an amazing taste. If you liked Nestle Crunch Bars, then you will love these. That's what they taste like. They aren't big, but at 90 calories they can hit the spot when you are looking for a low carb and moderate protein treat!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Flora

customer_reviews.title: Flavor. No  sugar
customer_reviews.text: I love these ! I eat one every day. Taste , texture . Like a candy bar!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa rosenstein

customer_reviews.title: Cuts the craving
customer_reviews.text: Friend told me about this low carbohydrate, protein bar when I said I had sweet tooth cravings. It's flavorfully chocolate and crunchy. I tried samples of coconut and raspberry too, but chocolate is my favorite! Label is misleading because it looks like 16 sugar, but it is really 1 gram (g looks like a 6) with 7 grams protein and 3 net carbs. Yummy and cuts the craving! Totally satisfied for the evening!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H

customer_reviews.title: This is a SCAM! Not a Keto bar! 12 Net Carbs...
customer_reviews.text: This is not a Keto bar and their product facts are a lie! The bar has FAR more carbs (12 grams of net carbs) and this is false advertising to call it a 3 net carb bar. I feel scammed because this isnt returnable even though its false advertising that got me to purchase in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Adam H

customer_reviews.title: Not keto friendly 7g of carbs per bar.
customer_reviews.text: Not for keto. This has 7grams of carbs per bar. 15g total 2g fiber and 12g alcohol sugars. Minus half the alcohol sugars and all the fiber 15-8=7. Now with that in mind you can eat it on keto if you eat a quarter of the bar a day. I got them and then regretted buying them due to their high carb count. I eat them only as a cheat snack and only once every two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Smokalangelo

customer_reviews.title: Yum Yum Yum with protien... lol
customer_reviews.text: These are so darn tasty. I crave sweets, just how it is. These make me feel like I am eating a candy bar and cheating. Low carb, low calories and getting some protein. Can not beat that since they taste great too. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emmy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Dried out
customer_reviews.text: I guess I got one of the bad batches other reviewers mentioned. The ingredient list looks good, and the nutritional information adds up (contrary to the negative top review, which is incorrect and ignorant). For those reasons, I’m still giving them 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: See you

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Reminds me of the yummy whatchamacallit bars. Hard to believe these are protein bars.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Belina

customer_reviews.title: Gritty and bad aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: I am a bariatric patient. I am.always looking for something low in sugar to replace sweets. I had high hopes for this bar, but it is awful. It is sweet, but almost too sweet. It also has an awful aftertaste. The mouth feel is also way to thick and gritty. I am very upset at this bar.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Harter

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: The taste is ok for someone who cant really eat a regular chocolate bar anymore but it is nothing to rave about. The sugar substitute has the dreaded cooling effect and may cause additional trips to the restroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jona

product_meta.title: NEOH Low Carb Protein & Candy Bar - Keto Snack Low Sugar (1 Gram), 90 Calories, 8 Grams Protein (Chocolate Crunch 12-Pack)
feature_bullets: ★ Delicious taste of a chocolate crunch bar in a protein-packed snack. The guilt-free candy bar!
★ 90 calorie bar contains only 1g sugar, 7g protein, 3g net carbs (15g total), 5 sources of protein
★ Perfect for on-the-go with 33% protein to give you an energy boost
★ Keto friendly: High in protein, low in net carbs and sugar
★ Low glycemic index, alkaline food, contains antioxidants
